description:
International and domestic adoptive parent home studies, adoption information and agency/attorney referrals, birth parent counseling, adoptive parent counseling and education, support for adult adoptees and birth parents dealing with search and reunion issues.

Parenting classes for adoptive parents and childbirth education for women choosing not to parent. Support services for open and closed adoptions, kinship adoptions, special needs adoptions, and second parent adoptions.
name: ADOPTION SUPPORT SERVICES
